```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
trashwheel_data = read_excel("data/HealthyHarborWaterWheelTotals2018-7-28.xlsx", 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(-x15) %>%
  drop_na(dumpster) %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = as.integer(round(sports_balls, 0)))
```

```{r}
precip_2018 = read_excel("data/HealthyHarborWaterWheelTotals2018-7-28.xlsx", 3, skip = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(year = 2018)
```

```{r}
precip_2017 = read_excel("data/HealthyHarborWaterWheelTotals2018-7-28.xlsx", 4, skip = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(year = 2017)
```
